messages: I want to build a simple todo app inspired by Monday.com's clean design. This will be a React + Vite web application that runs entirely in the browser.

The app needs these features:
1. Display a list of tasks as cards
2. Each task has a title, optional description, and completion status
3. Add new tasks via an input form at the top
4. Edit task titles inline by clicking on them
5. Delete tasks with a trash icon (show confirmation)
6. Toggle task completion with a checkbox
7. Filter tasks: Show All, Active only, or Completed only
8. Store all tasks in localStorage so they persist on refresh

For the UI design:
- Use Monday.com's purple (#6161FF) as the accent color
- Clean white background with subtle gray borders
- Cards have rounded corners and subtle shadows
- Smooth hover animations on interactive elements
- Responsive: stack vertically on mobile, horizontal filters on desktop

Technical stack:
- React 18 with TypeScript
- Vite as the build tool
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- No external state management (React useState is fine)
- No backend - pure client-side localStorage
- Structure: components/, hooks/, types/ folders
